headline: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) Seeks 20-Year License Renewal For Robinson Nuclear Plant
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE:DUK) has recently reinforced its commitment to nuclear energy by submitting a license renewal application for the Robinson Nuclear Plant, aiming to extend operations until 2050. Over the last quarter, the company's stock price rose by 7%, a performance that stands out against a backdrop of market challenges, including a 12% downturn in the broader market amid volatile trading and tariff uncertainties. During this period, Duke Energy also saw significant events such as...

headline: Duke Energy applies to extend Robinson nuclear plant’s licence
summary: The plant began commercial operations in 1971 and has been fundamental to meeting the growing energy needs of communities in the Carolinas.

headline: Duke Energy to announce first-quarter financial results on May 6
summary: Duke Energy will post its first-quarter 2025 financial results at 7 a.m. ET on Tuesday, May 6 on the company's website at duke-energy.com/investors.

headline: Want Stable Passive Income? 2 High-Yield Dividend Stocks to Buy Right Now.
summary: In an era of economic uncertainty and market volatility, the quest for reliable income has become increasingly important for investors.  The appeal is straightforward: regular cash payments that arrive regardless of market conditions, providing a dependable income stream when it's needed most.  High-yield dividend stocks are particularly attractive in the current environment.
